<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hunter's Bane](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3408)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Detection" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=574" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=709" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 305 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Price** 6 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="" /><row>([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561))</row></row>

 

**Trigger** A [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=79) or [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=96) enemy hits you with an attack

**Requirement** You're trained in Survivial.
</row>

</column>

---

This talisman is a ring of dried, interwoven pieces of straw. When you activate the _hunter's bane_, you sense the exact location of the attacker. It becomes [observed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=84) by you if it was [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=79) from you or becomes hidden from you if it was [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=96). If the attacker is behind lead, the _hunter's bane_ has no effect.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Hunter's Bane
